rep.text: It's so interesting to see a Na'Hum. You are not here to harm our village, are you?
No, why would you think so?
They say your people consider killing animals a game. Some even say you put their skins on walls for bragging...
Well... That is some of our traditions, yes... We are predators and predators hunt their prey...
Us, Ju'Ji aren't predators, we grow our food and live in peace with other animals...
It's quite easy to achieve this with your climate...
